title: Opening Inaccuracies Tool Released
description: A new analysis tool that imports your games and surfaces recurring opening inaccuracies, helping you spot familiar habits and patterns that quietly hold back improvement.

title: Using Maia to Find Repertoire Gaps
description: An exploration of how Maia exposes hidden gaps in your opening repertoire by comparing your moves against realistic, human-like expectations rather than engine-driven calculations.

title: Integrating Maia2 into My Chess Application
description: A behind-the-scenes technical overview of what Maia2 is, why it matters for chess improvement, and how it was integrated into my application for more human-focused analysis.
